summary:
Ever Wish you Could get a Lil Blast from the Past & a Different Dimension?
Well you can now You Can with Nuka-Cola.
This is...Erm Kinda Lore Friendly...Well the Textures are!.
But mainly This is For Fun and now Modders Resource!
descriptionHtml:
You May Not Use This In Or For A Payed Mod!
I Decided to Have a Bit of Fun and Learn some new tricks With Modding and Manipulating Meshes so I made Nuka-Cola one of the Best Things in Fallout Lore!
I also Decided to make this a Modders Resource.
You can Find 3 (and only three) in Riverwood Traders in Riverwood.
Nuka-Cola Restores an Amazing 15 Stamina what could be Better!
NOTE: Use as you Want But Give Me The Resource.

if you want a Real and Serius Nuka-Cola Mod Check out my Fallout 3 and NV Mod:
http://fallout3.nexusmods.com/mods/19016//?
http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/50163//?
[heading]Endorse if you Like But Please Submit your Awesome Nuka-Riffic Pictures.
Q:Does it matter what the Pictures are or Have in it?[/heading]
A:Nope it can be anything you want but must include Nuka-Cola.
author: RyceKaeks
